name: Platformer Testing
description:
Character By: rvros or https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero

Forest Background By: edermunizz or https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest

Menu Music By: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHJVYelCXpsV8P4EVWBgj0A

Forest Music From Octopath Traveller

Completely forgot to credit the creator of the skeleton sprites:

Skeleton Sprites By: Jesse Munguia or https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack

Everything else made by me.

Ignore the bugs this is the first thing on clickteam i've made from scratch.

Please give feedback if you think this has potential!

I need name suggestions too!

Controls (Keyboard ):

Left Arrow: Move Left

Right Arrow: Move Right

Z: Jump

X: Attack

Controls (Xbox Controller):

DPad Left: Move Left

DPad Right: Move Right

A:Jump

X : Attack

NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT IN MAIN MENU RN.
